prop.name: provider
prop.desc: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.

prop.name: busName
prop.desc: The name of the bus (e.g. Bolt Express).

prop.name: departureBusStop
prop.desc: The stop or station from which the bus departs.

prop.name: arrivalBusStop
prop.desc: The stop or station from which the bus arrives.

prop.name: busNumber
prop.desc: The unique identifier for the bus.
